top_comments_top.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

Every headline needs to end “because of republicans.”

Biden can’t pass family leave…because of republicans.

Biden can’t increase taxes on billionaires…because of republicans.

Biden can’t pass infrastructure and fix our failing roads…because of republicans.

America is failing…because of republicans.

It’s really not that hard and will be totally accurate 99% of the time.
Makes sense.  We have more idiots per capita.

Well we are a heavily brainwashed nation in denial at the moment unfortunately. Simple words like socialism just throw the simple
minded who are over fed fear into a frenzy without even understanding the situation…. But there’s that word I’m supposed to hate because my news network of choice repeats it over and over again feeding them that confirmation bias dopamine they’re addicted to. Funny how words like that get attached to anything that goes against those talking heads personal interest too. 🤔
